The rules for Hangman is as follows:


- You need to guess the hidden word displayed by a number of '*'.
 - If you guess the word before the man is hanged, you win!
 - If you guess wrong 7 times, (the man is fully displayed in the noose,
 and a final wrong answer will kill him) then you loose the game.

 - Each time you win, you will go up a point in the highscore list. 

If you press 'New game!'. the game will reset and you can try again.

 Good luck convict!
